title: How do I level up on the boards?
body: I used to read the boards often but stopped as my account won't let me comment, upvote, or create discussions saying that I'm level four. I don't know how t level up and when I tried to look up how to I couldn't find anything. My account is level 30 and I've been playing for over a year and a half I believe and with the end of the spring LCS split I want to start a discussion about my ideas on how to improve the fantasy aspect of LCS and hopefully get back into reading the boards if I can either get this fixed or figure out how to level up.

replies.body: Glad to see you got it worked out on your own! For future reference, your boards level = Summoner level ^_^
It's not fixed for me though, I still can't comment.. I'm level 42 in game :'(
